text: 2.9: Sng 34.17-19; 1 Ko 10.13; Zu 1.6Nza Fhe Bakɨme muuŋgi bigi, nza nta ndɨkndɨgap, nza kaŋgi. Maaŋ muuŋgip, mparmpare the Fhe Bakɨme zɨn vui guma then hɨgɨrga, Guma Bakɨme taagi mbe ndirga tuav, ana ana kaŋgi. Ana taagi mbe ndigɨrga. Guma Bakɨme, ana mba gumgi mbatɨgi mbui tɨvi, ana nta kaŋgi. Ana ne suaŋv vheza mbatɨgar mben nɨɨnga tuap, ana vhɨra ana kaŋgi. Ana ne suaŋv vheza mbatɨgar mben nɨɨŋv, ana vhɨra mba Fhe Bakɨme mben tɨvi mbatɨgi ga suaŋv mbe suanga tuga bakɨmen rarga ki.
